Perceptor::

Perceptor sniffed the bot that was close of him (Megatron) and=
 he noticed an familiar scent and an a danger around his throath . But he d=
idn't move it,  and said "Am I in front of Megatron, The greatest Deceptico=
n's leader? "

----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robertdahl 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 12:28 AM
  Subject: Re: A=
 time, 20 million years ago


  Megatron opened up the enrgon bars. He grit=
ed his teeth, at the site of
  all the Decepticon terrorists, deposed by Ga=
untlet Prime. The smell of
  stagnating fuel burned his optics. He was abou=
t to turn away from the
  dead soldiers, when a glint caught his eye. He wa=
ded into the
  deactivated robots, and undug a robot, who's eyes still glin=
ted, but
  never functioned to this day.
  ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::=
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
  Megatron snapped out of the past, =
he walked up to Perceptor, and
  attempted to put his hand around the Preda=
cons throat.
